name: Planet Heist (FootGamesInc)
description:
You're a thief commissioned  to steal from the boss of Planet Vice, an entire planet devoted to gambling. Your task is too open the vault using the codes found on destroyed guards. 

---KNOWN BUGS--

--Collecting too many codes will make them all disappear, please check the keypad before you get more then 5 codes--

---CONTROLS---

- A-D  to move

-Other controls are in-game

---THINGS I FORGOT TO SPECIFY--

-Walking over dead bots is a 30% chance to pick up a code, not guaranteed

-you can only open the keypad menu by standing near the in-game keypad, located in the middle of the bottom floor

-the attack is a short range blast, some people thought it was a ranged gun, that's my bad for making the sound effect not be clearer

-there's only the one level, sorry, i ran out of time before i could make more

--Made in a week for the Major Jam #4--
